name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: Galaxy S21 5G and S21+ 5G, made for the epic in everyday with vibrant colours and a revolution in video and photography with 8K video and 30X Space Zoom.

name: REDMI 10
description: This smartphone boasts a large 6000 mAh battery with an 18 W fast charging capability giving your phone a necessary boost to achieve optimal efficiency.

name: Vivo T1
description: T1 5G is equipped with a vivo standard charger (power adapter 9V/2A), and supports up to 18W Fast Charge. The actual charging power is dynamically adjusted.

name: Oppo K10
description: OPPO K10 is an ideal smartphone for photography lovers. It is equipped with a robust, AI-powered camera setup that features DSLR quality images.

name: One Plus 10R
description: The phone comes with a 120 Hz refresh rate 6.70-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 1080x2412 pixels (FHD+) and an aspect ratio of 20:9.
